Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class MarketBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.MarketBuilder
public class MarketBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
This class follows the factory pattern and creates an instance of the resource market

    • random

      private static java.security.SecureRandom random

  • Constructor Details

    • MarketBuilder

      public MarketBuilder()

  • Method Details

    • build

      public static Market build()
      Builds the standard market, should be called at the start of a new fresh game
      Returns:
      the market with the standard set of marbles in random positions

    • build

      public static Market build​(MarketMarble[][] importedTray, MarketMarble importedExtra, java.util.Map<Player,​java.util.List<MarketMarble>> playerAbilities)
      This method is called when a saved game is loaded and initialized
      Parameters:
      importedTray - saved market tray
      importedExtra - saved extra marble
      playerAbilities - saved map of player WhiteMarbleAbilities, in case of no abilities a empty map should be provided
      Returns:
      the constructed market, which could be a marketTray or a MarketTrayAbility depending of the state of the saved game

    • randomize

      private static MarketMarble[][] randomize​(java.util.HashMap<MarketMarble,​java.lang.Integer> marbleSet)
      This methods places a set of marbles randomly into a 3x4 array
      Parameters:
      marbleSet - the map of the set of marbles, mapping color to quantity
      Returns:
      the randomized array

    • getLast

      private static MarketMarble getLast​(java.util.HashMap<MarketMarble,​java.lang.Integer> marbleSet)
      This method should be called after randomize. It takes out the last marble from the marble map. Its purpose is for determining the extra marble in the market
      Parameters:
      marbleSet - the map of marbles
      Returns:
      the last marble remaining
